original_text: You will have enough milk from your goats to feed yourself, your family and your female servants. 27: The last proverb in this chapter (verses 23-27) shows that God will give us what we need, if we are careful to take care of the things that he has given to us. You will have enough milk from your goats to feed yourself, your family and your female servants.
korean_text: 염소의 젖은 넉넉하여 너와 네 집의 음식이 되며 네 여종의 먹을 것이 되느니라

sentences.original_text: You will have enough milk from your goats
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 염소들에게서 충분한 우유를 얻을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The last proverb in this chapter (verses 23-27)
shows that God will give us what we need
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 우리에게 필요한 것을 주실 것임을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: to take care of the things
that he has given to us.
You will have enough milk from your goats
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 염소들에게서 충분한 우유를 얻을 것입니다
